tool_description:
A RESTful API designed for developers who want to access hyper-localized product data
More than 60 available retailers (food & beverages, pets, electronics & hightech, sport, DIY) - 90% located in France
name: Products
title: Products

api_list.name: Product search
Price by UPC
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datagram-products-v1.p.rapidapi.com/storeproduct/ean/5000112609790/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datagram-products-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://datagram-products-v1.p.rapidapi.com/storeproduct/ean/{upc}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datagram-products-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
